ygData.subject: Re: The bum and the hole...
ygData.msgSnippet: Grimlock kept chasing the car furiously growling, ignoring Pacifix. He coiled his powerful legs together, and launched himself forward, just over the magma,

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Grimlock kept chasing the car furiously growling, ignoring Pacifix. He
coiled his powerful legs together, and launched himself forward, just
over the magma, and hopefully onto the vehicle, wanting to bring down
his 20 foot frame.
